attachments.title: Virtual and augmented reality enhancements to medical and science student physiology and anatomy test performance: A systematic review and meta-analysis
attachments.citation: Moro, C., Birt, J., Stromberga, Z., Phelps, C., Clark, J., Glasziou, P., & Scott, A. M. (2021). Virtual and augmented reality enhancements to medical and science student physiology and anatomy test performance: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Anatomical Sciences Education, 14(3), 368–376. https://doi.org/10.1002/ase.2049

prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题： 作者收集了多少篇论文？

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Virtual and augmented reality enhancements to medical and science student physiology and anatomy test performance: A systematic review and meta-analysis, was published on 2021. (It can be cite this paper as Moro et al., 2021 on your answer).
response:
根据您提供的文件《Virtual and augmented reality enhancements to medical and science student physiology and anatomy test performance: A systematic review and meta-analysis》中的信息，作者在进行文献搜索时共找到了919条记录。在对这些记录进行全文审查之后，共有52篇论文被纳入全文审查，最终有8项研究符合全部资格要求。

以下是回答的Markdown格式：

```markdown
根据Moro等人在2021年发表的系统综述和元分析论文，作者们在文献搜索中发现了**919条记录**。在对这些记录进行了全文审查后，**52篇论文**被纳入了审查，最终有**8项研究**符合全部资格要求。
```
请注意，这个回答是基于您提供的文件内容，并且按照您的要求使用了中文和Markdown格式。
